items.name: static let `default`: AVPlayerItemLegibleOutput.TextStylingResolution
items.desc: The text styling information is the same level of information that AVFoundation uses within a player layer.

items.name: static let sourceAndRulesOnly: AVPlayerItemLegibleOutput.TextStylingResolution
items.desc: The level of resolution excludes styling provided by the user-level Media Accessibility settings.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a text styling resolution structure with a string value.
